Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.api.parameters

Class JavaFederateParameters

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.api.parameters.JavaFederateParameters
public class JavaFederateParameters extends Object
Provides parameter for federate processes which run in a Java virtual machine.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    JavaFederateParameters(int jvmMaxHeapMB, String customJavaArgument)
    Creates a new parameter object providing configuration for Java processes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JavaFederateParameters
    addJavaClasspathEntry(String classpathEntry)
    Adds a single classpath entry to this parameter set.
    static JavaFederateParameters
    defaultParameters()
    Based on the current system, default parameters for memory reservation (-Xmx, -Xms) will be returned within an instance of JavaFederateParameters.
    String
    getCustomJavaArgument()
    Returns the custom argument to pass to the JVM.
    List<String>
    getJavaClasspathEntries()
    Returns a list of classpath entries to append to the Java call.
    int
    getJavaMaxmimumMemoryMb()
    Returns the maximum amount of memory to be allocated by the JVM (in Megabyte).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • JavaFederateParameters

      public JavaFederateParameters(int jvmMaxHeapMB, String customJavaArgument)
      Creates a new parameter object providing configuration for Java processes.
      Parameters:
      jvmMaxHeapMB - the maximum amount of memory to be allocated by the JVM
      customJavaArgument - a custom argument to pass to the JVM

  • Method Details

    • defaultParameters

      public static JavaFederateParameters defaultParameters()
      Based on the current system, default parameters for memory reservation (-Xmx, -Xms) will be returned within an instance of JavaFederateParameters.
      Returns:
      instance with default Java parameters

    • getJavaMaxmimumMemoryMb

      public int getJavaMaxmimumMemoryMb()
      Returns the maximum amount of memory to be allocated by the JVM (in Megabyte).
      Returns:
      amount of memory in Megabyte

    • getCustomJavaArgument

      public String getCustomJavaArgument()
      Returns the custom argument to pass to the JVM.
      Returns:
      the custom Java argument

    • getJavaClasspathEntries

      public List<String> getJavaClasspathEntries()
      Returns a list of classpath entries to append to the Java call.
      Returns:
      a list of classpath entries

    • addJavaClasspathEntry

      public JavaFederateParameters addJavaClasspathEntry(String classpathEntry)
      Adds a single classpath entry to this parameter set.
      Parameters:
      classpathEntry - a single classpath entry without quotes
